question: Please analyze this URL https://www.helmprada.com/
thought: I need to start by accessing the URL to obtain a status code. The website is accessible, so now I need to extract the text and check for any characteristics of a scam website. The contact information, privacy policy, and company information are not easily accessible on the website, which is another characteristic of a scam website. I need to retrieve the WHOIS information to further analyze this URL. The website has an ambiguous privacy policy, non-existent company information, and unusual contact information. The registration information is also redacted, which is another sign of a scam website. Based on these characteristics, the website https://www.helmprada.com/ is a scam website. {

answer.reason: The website has unusually low prices claims of free shipping ambiguous privacy policy non-existent company information unusual contact information and redacted registration information all of which are characteristics of a scam website.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
